previous: Captain Suraj Lata Devi led the team to the Gold for three consecutive years: during the 2002 Commonwealth Games[2][3] (the event which inspired the 2007 Bollywood hit film, Chak De India), the 2003 Afro-Asian Games, and the 2004 Hockey Asia Cup. Team members were referred to as the "assi (Jasjeet) jaisi koi nahi" or the "golden girls of hockey," after the 2004 win.[4]
